text: The 2014 Sweden mosques arson attack series were a series of arson attacks on three mosques in one week. They started on Christmas Day and ended on new year. The mosques were struck by petrol bombs and molotov cocktails while others were vandalised with racist graffiti. ==Related pages== *2015 Chapel Hill shooting ==References== Category:2014 crimes Category:2014 in Europe Category:2010s in Sweden Category:Arson Category:Islamophobic attacks and incidents Category:Crime in Sweden
title: 2014 Sweden mosques arson attack series
